Class BookingSelectPage(Common)

class pages.pages_case_1.booking_select_page.BookingSelectPage(driver)

Bases: Common

BASIC_FARE_BUTTON: tuple = ('xpath', "//div[@role='button' and contains(@class, 'fare-control')]")
CONTINUE_BUTTON: tuple = ('xpath', "//*[@id='maincontent']/div/div[2]/div/div/button-container/div/div/button")
FLIGHT_BUTTON: tuple = ('xpath', "(//*[@class='journey-select_list ng-star-inserted']/*)[1]//*[@class='journey_price']")
FLIGHT_BUTTON_RETURN: tuple = ('xpath', "(//*[@class='journey-select_journey-filter ng-star-inserted']/following-sibling::*[@class='journey-select_list ng-star-inserted']/*)[1]//*[@class='journey_price']")
LOADER_B: tuple = ('xpath', "//*[contains(@class, 'page-loader') or contains(@class, 'loading') or contains(@class, 'loader')]")
RELATIVE_DAY_MAPPING = {'1 day after': 4, '1 day before': 3, '2 days after': 5, '2 days before': 2, '3 days after': 6, '3 days before': 1}
SELECT_ANOTHER_DATE_BUTTON: tuple = ('xpath', "//*[@class='day-selector_item ng-star-inserted'][{}]//*[contains(@class,'day-control') and contains(@aria-label,'Schedule.A11y.CalendarDay.AriaLabel')]")
button_continue_to_move_to_passenger_form()

Clicks the “Continue” button to move to the passenger form.

This method waits until the button is visible, scrolls down to the element using ActionChains, clicks on it, and logs the action performed. If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

click_drop_down_flight()

Clicks on the dropdown button of the flight to select a tariff.

This method waits until the button is clickable, moves to the element using ActionChains, clicks on it, and logs the action performed. If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

click_drop_down_return_flight()

Clicks on the dropdown button of the flight to select a tariff.

This method waits until the button is clickable, moves to the element using ActionChains, clicks on it, and logs the action performed. If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

click_on_fare_flight()

Clicks on the ‘Basic’ fare button.

This method waits until the button is clickable, moves to the element using ActionChains, clicks on it, and logs the action performed. If the button is not found or clickable within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.

click_relative_date(label)

Clicks on the departure date option based on a human-readable label.

Parameters:

label (str) – One of the keys in RELATIVE_DAY_MAPPING, like “2 días después”

get_sesion_params()

Searches for a response with “session” in the URL and returns a JSON object with the response body.

Iterates over the requests history and searches for a response that contains “session” in its URL. If found, decodes the response body according to the encoding, converts it to a JSON object and logs the JSON object. If any error occurs during this process, logs the error and returns None.

Returns:

A JSON object with the response body if found, None otherwise.

Return type:

dict

loader_b()

Waits for the page loader to disappear.

This method waits until the page loader disappears. If the loader does not disappear within the timeout period, a TimeoutException is raised.
